issue.title: [Rust] Implement VALIDATE mode in integration test binary
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8833](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8833). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The binary arrow-json-integration-test.rs already supports converting arrow files to json, and json to arrow.

We now need to implement the VALIDATE command, which should read an Arrow and a JSON file and ensure that they contain the same batches.

See the Java implementation at java/tools/src/main/java/org/apache/arrow/tools/Integration.java for an example.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8833?focusedCommentId=17109579) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7208
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7208>
